docna.cdata!:
Brazil - Export Development Project : Loan
            2347 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Brazil - Export Development
            Project : Loan 2347 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

docna.cdata!:
Brazil - Export Development Project : Loan
            2347 - Operating Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Brazil - Export Development
            Project : Loan 2347 - Operating Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed loan has been developed as
            part of a Special Action Program for Brazil. The project
            would support expansion of Brazil's manufactured
            exports by liberalizing imports and increasing the
            availability of foreign exchange under the duty drawback
            system. Eligible exporters would be given automatic access
            to imports of raw materials, intermediate products and
            components, to be used in the production of their exports.
            As such, the purpose of the project is to establish a de
            facto free trade regime for export production. Drawback
            imports within the allocations of foreign exchange would be
            made according to previously established criteria agreed
            upon with the Bank and made public in the country.
